1470352670003449856.full_text:
A true story happened in Nanjing.
"OK. Then if your parents are local, please keep standing."
Half students sat down.
"If anyone of your grandparents is local, keep standing."
No one was standing now.
"You know why." The teacher said at last.
 #Nanjingmassacre
